query: SELECT TABLE_NAME, TABLE_ROWS, DATA_LENGTH FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() ORDER BY TABLE_NAME
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2zwSb7aZqxwGG5M.6a2ce670420f --database VZSKie7tbgMy9Wer2TYaY4 --execute SELECT TABLE_NAME, TABLE_ROWS, DATA_LENGTH FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() ORDER BY TABLE_NAME
